function convertDate(dateToConvert){var date=new Date(dateToConvert);var year=date.getFullYear();var month=String(date.getMonth()+1).padStart(2,'0');// Months are zero-based
var day=String(date.getDate()).padStart(2,'0');var hours=String(date.getHours()).padStart(2,'0');var minutes=String(date.getMinutes()).padStart(2,'0');var seconds=String(date.getSeconds()).padStart(2,'0');var formattedDate="".concat(day,"/").concat(month,"/").concat(year," ").concat(hours,":").concat(minutes,":").concat(seconds);return formattedDate;}export default convertDate;
